entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is referred to as the Chosen One and has a scar. He is also mentioned as having been kissed goodbye by his mother.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is sitting in an empty seat that would have been Harry's if he hadn't been the Chosen One.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a threat to Harry and his mother.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who would have kissed goodbye Harry's mother if Harry hadn't been the Chosen One.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is sympathetically asking Harry if he is all right and mentions feeling a Wrackspurt around her.

entities.name: wrackspurt
entities.description: A Wrackspurt is an invisible entity that floats in through one's ears and makes their brain go fuzzy.

relationships.description: Neville would have sat in Harry's seat if he hadn't been the Chosen One.
Ron would have kissed goodbye Harry's mother if Harry hadn't been the Chosen One.
Luna feels a Wrackspurt around her and is trying to beat it off.
